name: plus
effect:
This Pokémon has 1.5× its Special Attack if any friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  If either ability is disabled by gastro acid, both lose their effect.
short_effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

effect_changes.black-white: Powers up only when paired with minus.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

Pokémon has Minus.
